video_title: Negative Emotion Is The Most Powerful Source Of Motivation
transcript:
negative emotion is actually the most
powerful source of motivation and when
we run away from it when we fear it when
we suppress it we're actually
hamstringing ourselves in terms of our
capacity to like drive forward and get
through other stuff because the other
thing that we sometimes don't realize is
that negative emotion is the best way to
overcome other negative emotion you know
I'm I'm socially anxious what makes me
finally leave the house being so lonely
love and compassion is not is never
going to conquer social anxiety I mean
that's not true it can't but well what
will conquer anger is like what will
conquer fear is anger and I don't think
we really understand that a lot of
people that I work with are stuck
between two negative emotions and they
try to suppress everything instead of
channeling one to overcome the other
